description.p: Multiplatform MIDI File Player for Linux, Windows and macOS with advanced features:

ul.li: MIDI Output to hardware MIDI ports, or any other Drumstick backend like soft-synths
Transpose song tonality between -12 and +12 semitones
Change MIDI volume level (using MIDI CC7)
Scale song speed between half and double tempo
Piano Players, MIDI Channels, Rhythm, and Lyrics (Karaoke) views
Supports .MID (Standard MIDI files), .RMI (RIFF RMID), .KAR (MIDI Karaoke), and .WRK (Cakewalk) file formats

description.p: Release dedicated to the Galician Literature Day.

ul.li: New Galician translation and help page.
New sample song: Negra Sombra.
New Splash screen during May for Galician language users.
Frameless tool windows (channels, player piano, lyrics, help).
Requires: drumstick-2.6.

description.p: This release includes the following fixes and features
